Text: License key will not work for me I get "License Invalid"

Managed to get it working after deleting pk.txt from sdcard/copilot/save left over by previous version.
Once I had done this the fresh install did not ask for a serial and worked from the off.

If you are upgrading take note.

Otherwise a great release!

If you prefer just one country by your selection, don't install the folder with maps on SD card, just simply after the installation of .apk run the program, follow the on screen instruction and then select desired country from the menu. I recommend wi-fi conection and simply download the map from server... I did it just for one country from Central Europe and woks with no problem... and the serial no. is the same as in the previous version 8.2.0.218...  SeeYa :)

Worth mentioning: If you get "error downloading" when trying to set up the *eng-usa voice, just try again and select John or Lisa and it will go thru. You can later change it to *eng-usa (robotic voice) and it will function normally.
